item.title: 野村斥资 18 亿美元押注美国市场反弹
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc. ）告诉客户，在贸易紧张局势升级期间，金融市场动荡不安，但要保持投资。通过斥资 18 亿美元收购一家资产管理公司，这家日本经纪公司正在把钱用在刀刃上。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. is telling clients to stay invested through the turmoil that’s pervaded financial markets during the escalating trade tensions. With its $1.8 billion acquisition of an asset management business, the Japanese brokerage is putting its money where its mouth is.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯和阿联酋引领中东和北非地区风险投资融资额创 2023 年以来新高
item.description: 由于降息提振了市场情绪，第一季度中东和北非地区的风险资本投资激增。【原文：Venture capital investment in the Middle East and North Africa surged in the first quarter as interest rate cuts boosted sentiment.】

item.title: 印度银行创纪录，印度央行流动性新规提振前景
item.description: 由于印度央行放宽了流动性规定，该国价值 7500 亿美元的金融服务业前景更加乐观，周二印度贷款机构的股价飙升，创下了新的纪录。【原文：Shares of lenders in India surged to a fresh record on Tuesday, as the easing of liquidity rules by the central bank added to the optimism for the country’s $750 billion financial services sector.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金首席信息官在国内寻求更多私人投资
item.description: CAAT 养老金计划正在寻找加拿大的房地产和基础设施投资项目，在唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的贸易政策扰乱公共市场的情况下，继续其长期投资战略。【原文：CAAT Pension Plan is searching for Canadian real estate and infrastructure investments, continuing its strategy of investing for the long term as President Donald Trump’s erratic trade policy disrupts public markets.】

item.title: 迪拜豪宅热潮在关税动荡前创下新纪录
item.description: 迪拜奢侈品市场的繁荣持续到了第一季度，富裕买家再次推动了价值 1,000 万美元以上住宅的创纪录销售。【原文：The boom in Dubai’s luxury market continued into the first quarter, with wealthy buyers again driving record sales of homes valued above $10 million.】

item.title: 对世界经济增长的担忧挥之不去，铁矿石下跌
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战会损害全球经济增长，铁矿石恢复了跌势。【原文：Iron ore resumed its decline on concerns that US President Donald Trump’s trade war could hurt global economic growth.】

item.title: 香港离岸人民币融资成本降至历史新低
item.description: 一项衡量香港离岸人民币借贷成本的指标跌至自2013年有数据以来的最低点，即使在美元走软的情况下也给人民币带来了压力。【原文：A gauge of the offshore yuan’s borrowing cost in Hong Kong dropped to the lowest since data became available in 2013, putting pressure on the Chinese currency even as the dollar weakens.】

item.title: 中国贸易援助助推物流和支付企业反弹
item.description: 在中国政府试图通过促进自由贸易区活动和服务业的计划来对抗美国关税之后，包括物流和支付处理在内的与跨境贸易相关的中国公司股价大涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese companies tied to cross-border trade, including logistics and payment processing, jumped after the government sought to combat US tariffs with plans to promote free-trade zone activities and service industries.】

item.title: 石破写给习近平的信，日本希望避免贸易摩擦
item.description: 日本高级代表团本周将向中国领导人习近平递交首相石破茂的一封信，东京正努力避免陷入中美贸易摩擦升级的交火之中。【原文：A high-level Japanese delegation will deliver a letter from Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to Chinese leader Xi Jinping this week, as Tokyo strives to avoid getting caught in the crossfire of escalating trade friction between China and the US.】

item.title: 瑞银与印度财富管理公司 360 One 达成协议
item.description: 瑞士联合银行集团（UBS Group AG）与印度 360 One WAM 有限公司（360 One WAM Ltd. ）建立了独家合作伙伴关系，这项交易很可能会加速瑞士银行进入印度蓬勃发展的财富市场。【原文：UBS Group AG entered an exclusive partnership with India’s 360 One WAM Ltd. for a deal that likely will turbo-charge the Swiss bank’s exposure to the country’s booming wealth market.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国招商局集团同意以 4.2 亿美元收购加拿大 Lumina Gold 公司
item.description: 中国领先的钴铜矿商中国五矿集团同意以约 5.81 亿加元（4.2 亿美元）的价格收购加拿大卢米纳黄金公司，以开发厄瓜多尔最大的原生金矿。【原文：CMOC Group, a leading Chinese cobalt and copper miner, agreed to buy Canada’s Lumina Gold Corp. for about C$581 million ($420 million) to tap the largest primary gold deposit in Ecuador.】

item.title: 外卖竞争白热化，京东、美团股价大跌
item.description: 京东和美团在中国餐饮外卖领域的竞争愈演愈烈，给两家公司的股价带来了打击，因为投资者担心盈利能力会受到影响。【原文：An intensifying rivalry between JD.com Inc. and Meituan in China’s food delivery space is dealing a blow to their share prices, as investors worry about the hit to profitability.】

item.title: 三得利首席执行官称特朗普关税扼杀投资热情
item.description: 日本最大的饮料制造商之一的负责人表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税可能会导致经济衰退，从而使企业不愿在这个世界最大的经济体投资。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs could drive a recession that will make companies reluctant to invest in the world’s largest economy, according to the head of one of Japan’s biggest beverage makers.】

item.title: 韩国大选推动水泥生产商股价暴涨 103
item.description: 韩国一家水泥生产商的股价飙升，原因是散户投资者纷纷下注，认为这与韩国即将举行的总统选举及其领跑者李在明有关。【原文：A South Korean cement maker’s stock has surged as retail investors pile into bets seen as tied to the nation’s upcoming presidential election and its front-runner Lee Jae-myung.】

item.title: 美元疲软提振金属，铜价创两周新高
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所自周四以来首次恢复交易后，铜价上涨了 1%以上，因为基本金属受益于近期美元的下跌。【原文：Copper gained more than 1% after trading on the London Metal Exchange resumed for the first time since Thursday, as base metals benefited from the recent dollar rout.】

item.title: 泰国称与美国就特朗普关税计划的谈判被推迟
item.description: 泰国正寻求从特朗普政府对其商品征收 36% 关税的计划中获得缓和，该国表示，原定于本周举行的部长级会谈已被推迟。【原文：Thailand, which is seeking a reprieve from Trump administration’s plan to levy a 36% tariff on its goods, said ministerial level talks previously scheduled for this week have been delayed.】

item.title: 调查显示特朗普关税已对部分日本企业造成冲击
item.description: 据一项调查显示，唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动的影响已经渗透到日本公司，约有 10%的公司表示关税措施已经影响了他们的业务，更多的公司对未来的冲击表示担忧。【原文：The impact of Donald Trump’s tariff campaign has already filtered through to Japanese companies, with about 10% saying the measures have affected their businesses and more voicing concern on the future jolt, according to a survey.】

item.title: 住友商事和 SBI 控股将参股越南 FPT 人工智能部门
item.description: 住友商事株式会社（Sumitomo Corp.）和 SBI 控股株式会社（SBI Holdings Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Corp. and SBI Holdings Inc. will each acquire a 20% stake in a unit of Vietnam’s software and telecommunications conglomerate FPT Corp. to foster AI adoption in Japan, according to a statement.】

item.title: 印度莫迪将会见沙特王储，推动建立更密切的关系
item.description: 印度总理纳伦达-莫迪（Narenda Modi）将于周二开启为期两天的沙特阿拉伯之行，在全球贸易不确定性日益加剧之际，他将寻求加深与这个主要石油出口国和欧佩克+领导人的关系。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narenda Modi is set to kick off a two-day trip to Saudi Arabia on Tuesday as he seeks to deepen ties with the major oil exporter and OPEC+ leader at a time of mounting global trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 随着货币交易激增，花旗支持的平台 Spark 将招聘 13 名员工
item.description: 随着交易量和市场波动的增加，Spark Systems Pte.【原文：Spark Systems Pte. is looking to boost its foreign-exchange sales and developer ranks with up to 13 hires as trading volumes ramp up alongside market volatility.】

item.title: 印度央行增加现金比降息更有助于降低借贷成本
item.description: 印度央行史无前例地注入流动性，使关键隔夜利率大幅低于基准利率，预示着货币宽松政策将进一步深化。【原文：The Indian central bank’s unprecedented liquidity injections have pushed a key overnight rate significantly below the benchmark, signaling deeper monetary easing.】

item.title: 日本加藤希望本周与贝森特进一步开展外汇对话
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）表示，他的目标是本周在华盛顿与美国财务大臣斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）会面时，继续密切讨论货币问题。【原文：Japan’s Minister of Finance Katsunobu Kato said he aims to build on close discussions pertaining to currencies when he meets his US counterpart Scott Bessent in Washington this week.】

item.title: 收购公司 Thoma Bravo 接近达成收购波音公司杰普逊部门的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Thoma Bravo 公司正在就收购波音公司的杰普逊导航部门进行深入谈判。【原文：Thoma Bravo is in advanced talks to buy Boeing Co.’s Jeppesen navigation unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 金属亿万富翁阿加瓦尔在债务重组和沙特推动下寻求重启矿业
item.description: 印度亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）正逐步接近完成其金属能源企业集团韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）计划已久的分拆，此举旨在削减该集团 110 亿美元的债务，并将更多精力放在不同的业务上。【原文：Indian billionaire Anil Agarwal is inching closer to finishing a long-planned breakup of his metals-to-energy conglomerate Vedanta Ltd., a move aimed at trimming the group’s $11 billion debt pile and giving greater attention to different businesses.】

item.title: 亚马逊必须与卡车司机谈判，劳工委员会检察官称
item.description: 美国劳工委员会的检察官正试图迫使亚马逊公司与其旧金山仓库的工人进行集体谈判，从而推动了美国卡车司机工会（Teamsters union）组织这家电子零售巨头的努力。【原文：US labor board prosecutors are trying to compel Amazon.com Inc. to collectively bargain with its San Francisco warehouse workers, boosting the Teamsters union’s efforts to organize the e-retail giant.】

item.title: 特朗普加强对美联储鲍威尔的威胁，黄金飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统可能解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的担忧引发美股、债券和美元出逃之后，黄金升至历史新高。【原文：Gold rose to an all-time-high, after concern that President Donald Trump could fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell triggered a flight from US stocks, bonds and the dollar.】

item.title: 中国氧化铝出口飙升至七年新高，盈余扩大
item.description: 中国氧化铝供应日益过剩，推动 3 月份出口量达到历史第二高水平，预计在未来几个月内出口量仍将保持高位。【原文：China’s growing glut of alumina pushed exports to their second-highest level ever in March, with shipments expected to remain elevated for several more months.】
